Test Name: MAYOCOMPLETE Gynecological Cancer Panel, Next-Generation Sequencing (Tumor)
Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tumor tissue block or unstained slides with tumor tissue
Purpose: To detect clinically relevant genetic variants in gynecological tumors using next-generation sequencing for diagnostic and therapeutic guidance.
Container: FFPE tissue block or glass slide containing 5–10 µm sections
Equipment: Microtome, DNA extraction kit, Quantus Fluorometer, library preparation kit (e.g., Illumina TruSight Oncology 500), PCR thermal cycler, Illumina NextSeq 550 (or equivalent) NGS system, Bioanalyzer/TapeStation, pipettes with filtered tips
